original: @133b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @133b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: aom bha ga ba ti shru ti smri ti /
analyzed: aom bha ga ba ti shru ti smri ti /

original: ba la ba la padma siddhe sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ba la ba la padma siddhe sv'a h'a /

original: cho ga ni zhag bdun gyi bar du nang re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu khyor gang la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka sum brgya lobs so //
analyzed: cho ga ni zhag bdun gyi bar du nang re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu khyor gang la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka sum brgya lobs so //
translated: The ritual is that for seven days, every day in front of Ārya Avalokiteśvara, one should drink a handful of water enchanted seven times. Even in one day, one will learn three hundred śloka verses.

original: zla ba gcig gi bar du byas na mi'am ci dang 'dra bar mgrin pa snyan par 'gyur te the tshom za bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba gcig gi bar du byas na mi'am ci dang 'dra bar mgrin pa snyan par 'gyur te the tshom za bar mi bya'o //
translated: If one does it for one month, one's throat will become melodious like a kinnara. One should not doubt this.

original: mgrin pa snyan pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: mgrin pa snyan pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī of a melodious throat is complete.
